scripts.docker-build: docker build -t gauntface/gf-site:base -f src/infra/docker/base . && docker build -t gauntface/gf-site:development -f src/infra/docker/development .
scripts.docker-run: npm run docker-cleanup && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-run:mysql && docker run --name gauntface-local-docker --link gauntface-local-mysql -e BUILDTYPE=development -p 5123:80 -v $(pwd)/src:/gauntface/site -t gauntface/gf-site:development
scripts.docker-run:mysql: npm run docker-cleanup:mysql && docker run --name gauntface-local-mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -e MYSQL_USER=example-user -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=example-password -e MYSQL_DATABASE=example-db -d mysql/mysql-server:latest
scripts.//: To access the database in the docker container use "mysql -u root -p --host=gauntface-local-mysql"
scripts.docker-cleanup: npm run docker-stop && npm run docker-remove
scripts.docker-cleanup:mysql: npm run docker-stop:mysql && npm run docker-remove:mysql
